title: SimpleSnippet
description: A simple template with an icon, text, and optional button.

richText.description: Text with HTML subset allowed: i, b, u, strong, em, br

allOf.description: Snippet title displayed before snippet text
Main body text of snippet. HTML subset allowed: i, b, u, strong, em, br

icon.description: Snippet icon. 64x64px. SVG or PNG preferred.

title_icon.description: Small icon that shows up before the title / text. 16x16px. SVG or PNG preferred. Grayscale.

button_action.description: The type of action the button should trigger.

allOf.description: A url, button_label links to this

button_action_args.description: Additional parameters for button action, example which specific menu the button should open

allOf.description: Text for a button next to main snippet text that links to button_url. Requires button_url.

button_color.description: The text color of the button. Valid CSS color.

button_background_color.description: The background color of the button. Valid CSS color.

block_button_text.description: Tooltip text used for dismiss button.

tall.description: To be used by fundraising only, increases height to roughly 120px. Defaults to false.

do_not_autoblock.description: Used to prevent blocking the snippet after the CTA (link or button) has been clicked

allOf.description: The url where the link points to.

metric.description: Custom event name sent with telemetry event.

args.description: Additional parameters for link action, example which specific menu the button should open
